desc: Notorious Concepts LLC is the premier custom motorcycle builder in Colorado. Located in Parker, Colorado and founded by Will Ehlers, Notorious Concepts LLC created this website to allow our customers to shop from the luxury of home while still supporting a local shop!

layout.text: Get your ride ready for the season with a upgraded suspension from Legend Suspensions! Experience the ride quality and superior handling that Legend has to offer. Save 10% by using promo code Legend at checkout!
